text: Uye ndivo vanogadzira mapindu akarereka kana asina, uye nemiti yemadheti, nezvirimwa zvakasiyana zvimiro nemanakiro, nemaOrivhi, nechibage chechirungu, zvakafanana zvimiro uye zvakasiyana manakiro. Idyai michero yayo (miti) kana ichinge yaibva, asi bvisai chipo (Zakaah zvichienderana nemitemo yaAllah, chikamu chimwe kubva muzvikamu gumi (1/10) kana chikamu chimwe kubva muzvikamu makumi maviri (1/20)) pazuva rekukohwa kwayo, uye musave munoshandisa zvakapfurikidza (kutambisa). Zvirokwazvo, (Allah) havadi avo vanoshandisa zvakapfurikidza
